safetyTips: Our gloved delivery drivers are the only two people handling delivery boxes and bags, and we have a maximum of three team members at any time in store with no access for customers. We are able to handle goods as little as possible (just one person picking your order) and our cleaning and hygiene regime is to the extreme (especially when Lucia is in!).
name: InsideOut Health
description: We are Reigate's independent health food shop! We are a team of Nutritional Therapists with a passion for good food, environmentally friendly living and natural skincare. We stock earth friendly household products, practitioner level supplements, whole foods, chilled and frozen food, clean bodycare ranges and amazing speciality foods such as gluten free, organic dairy and vegan products. During lockdown we are offering FREE DELIVERY to Reigate, Redhill and surrounding areas including Banstead, Dorking and Tadworth.

safetyTips: Kitchen is deep cleaned every day and food is prepared wearing full PPE. Delivery driver with be wearing a hazmat suit, face mask, and a fresh pair of gloves. They will drop the food at your door, knock, and stand back 5 meters minimum until you open the door and collect your food.
name: The Gallery
description: We are a Café selling artisan sandwiches, drinks, and snacks. We also sell survival packages with essentials such as bread, milk, eggs, soap, tea bags, and jam and butter portions. These packages will also be available for free for vulnerable people in the community and have been paid forward by other generous locals. Ask us about paying it forward yourself if you would like to support our efforts and are in a position to do so.

safetyTips: We operate a signature free, drop and go delivery system
name: The Vineking
description: We are an Independent Wine Merchants and have been in Reigate since 2005.  We stock and deliver a wide range of wines, starting from £7.50 but also beers, spirits and we Deli Boards to enjoy at home too.  We offer free local delivery for all orders over £50, otherwise there is a £5 delivery charge.

safetyTips: Goods are delivered on door steps. Drivers get a safe distance back and await for customer to take goods from crate/box. Customer shuts door and driver collects box/crate.
name: Underwood Meat Company
address: Unit 4 Corium House, Douglas Drive, Godalming GU7 1JX

safetyTips: All staff trained in food handling and are taking all recommended safety precautions. Contact free delivery, drivers wear masks and gloves and drop on doorstep. Only card accepted. No visitors to office.
name: Upstream Seafoods
description: Fish and seafood - both fresh and frozen.

name: Cullenders Parkside
description: At Cullenders we are known for good quality homemade food. We are delivering dishes from a menu we have created including; meze, soup, pate, mousakka, short rib ragu, vegan options, cheese boards, lemon possets and other dishes. The dishes are freshly prepared and delivered chilled and ready to re-heat at home. We have a varying menu that will be changing every few weeks.
safetyTips: Food is packaged up, delivered and left on your doorstep.
Contactless deliveries, left on doorstep or safe place.
name: Fresh Connect
description: Delivering fruits, vegetables, dairy, dried & household goods

safetyTips: UK wide delivery and no contact click-and-collect.
name: Mandira’s Kitchen
address: Silent Pool, Shere Road, Albury GU5 9BW
description: Award-winning Indian freezer meals. Handmade in small batches using fresh produce and no additives. Gluten free with dairy free and vegan options. Ready from frozen in 4 minutes. UK wide delivery and no contact click-and-collect.

safetyTips: Virtual appointments to comply with social distancing rules, and sealed products home delivered.
name: Sonia Christie
description: Having lost over 7 stone myself, and maintained for years, I am an Above and Beyond award winning consultant, supporting others to get themselves healthier and slimmer. With now virtual 1-to-1 appointments due to the current pandemic, and a personalised plan, with nutritionally balanced products that can be delivered direct to your door. With limited socialising, there’s never been a better time to lose weight!

safetyTips: All of our staff are wearing PPE. We are offering a ZERO CONTACT delivery service.
name: Spaghetti Tree
address: 1 Walton Street, Walton on the Hill, Tadworth KT20 7RW
description: We are an independent family run restaurant. We deliver everything from pizza, pasta, steak, fish and desserts. We also delivery wine, cocktails, beers and ciders.
